## library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(mapproj)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Manually inputting data

```{r}
bigfoot <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-09-13/bigfoot.csv')

glimpse(bigfoot)
```


##  filtered data

Bigfoot data filtered to get rid of Alaska plots, unknown seasons, and outliers due to false data points.

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
filtered_bigfoot <- bigfoot%>%
  drop_na(latitude,
          season) %>%
  filter(state != "Alaska",
         season != "Unknown",
         longitude > -140)
```


## plotted data
```{r}
glimpse(filtered_bigfoot)
states <- map_data("state")
ggplot()+
  geom_polygon(data= states,
               aes(x= long,
                   y= lat, 
                   group= group,
                   fill = region))+
  geom_point(data= filtered_bigfoot,
             aes(x= longitude,
                 y= latitude),
             color="black",
             alpha = 0.5)+
  facet_wrap(~season)+
  labs(x= "Longitude",
       y= "Laditude",
       title= "Sight Spottings of Bigfoot in America Excluding Alaska")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
